attributes.action: Put David Attenborough's face on the twenty pound notes before he dies!
attributes.additional_details: David Attenborough has dedicated his life to animals, the environment and the world and, as a result, he is a national treasure!
attributes.background: I think, after all David Attenborough's great achievements, he should witness the countries gratitude by seeing an image of his own lovely face on the twenty pound notes. Will settle for a ten pound note but not a fifty (as I very rarely see them).

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here:
https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/banknote-characters
